name: The Orb (JoshProxy)
description:
This was built primarily for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 and will be developed a little further. The goal is to get The Orb to its destination. Use dual joysticks or aswd and mouse.

Resources Used:

  • Engine - Unity
  • Modeling - Blender
  • Environment Models - Various Synty Studios packs 
    • https://syntystore.com/products/polygon-fantasy-kingdom
    • https://syntystore.com/products/polygon-adventure-pack
    • https://syntystore.com/products/polygon-dungeon-pack
    • https://syntystore.com/products/polygon-knights-pack
  • FX - Polygon Particle FX Pack and Fantasy Ambient Sounds Pack
  • Music - Muz Station Productions - Total Music Collection 
  • Sound Effects - Cofofo - Monster Sounds Pack
  • UI - Poneti - Medieval Kingdom UI
  • Other very useful tools
    • IDE - JetBrains - Rider
    • Unity Workflow Helper - Odin
    • Cinemachine
    • Image Editing - Gimp
  • Shoutouts
    • Imphenzia has great low poly tutorials for Blender
    • Brackeys superb Unity tutorials
    • Jason Weiman really good game dev resource
